location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Military Board at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Military Board at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting accompanying bills for provisions, including rice, ghee and salt, supplied to the Factory Guard from the Residency at Bushire.
